title: Disconnecting with fine Internet
body: I use ethernet, 100Mbps, and i have 30 ping every game. YET somehow, I magically disconnect. Does anyone have a fix for this?

replies.body: Though your internet is fine, it seems that your network might specifically be having problems staying connected to the game server.  The best fix for this can be made through following each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  This will help strengthen your connection and adjust anything that may be blocking comms.  Hopefully, that does the trick!
